about:
I'm a recent grad from NIT-H completed my bachelors in Computer Science, and a current Software Developer Intern @Amazon. In past have been a Software Engineer Intern @LinkedIn and Google Summer of Code developer @Elasticsearch.

I enjoy working in a time-pressuerd and fast working environment as there I can have more space to learn and make maximum utilization of my time, so I sometimes work as a AWS freelancer over fiverr.

Here is the link to my fiverr profile: https://www.fiverr.com/anishaggarwa259

I'm passionate about Cryptography, Cloud-base infra, Lightning Network, Competetive Programming, chess, morning crosswords, and learning any and everything that happens to come my way. ðŸ˜€

I was ranked 1 worldwide in Elastic Contributor Program'2020 and have been to round-2 of Facbook HackerCup'2021

help:
• path - display current directory
  • cat FILENAME - display FILENAME in window
  • cd DIRECTORY - move into DIRECTORY or just cd to return to root
  • ls - show files in current directory
  • history - see your command history
  • clear - clear current window
